article.title: Morphological evidence for a past minor merger in the Seyfert galaxy NGC 1068

multiple_choice_question.text: What type of object is UDO-SE identified as in this figure?
What is the approximate size of the cutout image around NGC 1068 shown in the right panel?
What does the green curve in this figure represent?
choices: Theoretical curve for pure Poisson noise data
Depth of HSC data at different aperture radii

multiple_choice_question.text: What technique is used in this figure to highlight the "Banana" structure?
Compared to UDGs found in galaxy clusters, how do the NGC 1068 UDOs appear in the top panel of this figure?

The article mentions that assuming the dynamical mass of NGC 1068 within a 74.6 kpc sphere is 3 × 10<sup>11</sup> M<sub>☉</sub>, the orbital period of the loop is estimated to be 1.2 Gyr. What formula is likely used to calculate this orbital period?
